name: quad-cortex-raycast
title: Quad Cortex® Device List
description: Search the Neural DSP® Quad Cortex® device list
author: seanwashbot

commands.name: search-quad-cortex-device-list
commands.title: Search Quad Cortex® device list
commands.subtitle: Search
commands.description: Search the Neural DSP® Quad Cortex® device list by name, category, or based on…

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
